detectors.description:
SafeMath.sub(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TMJToken.sol#31-34) has assert violation
	Assert violations:
	- assert(bool)(b <= a) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TMJToken.sol#32)

StandardToken.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TMJToken.sol#125-138) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[_from] = balances[_from].sub(_value) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TMJToken.sol#133)

detectors.description:
StandardToken (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TMJToken.sol#114-193) inherits the contract, there is a conflict between state variables and functions
	Conflicting functions and state variables:
	- ERC20Basic.totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TMJToken.sol#50)
	- BasicToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TMJToken.sol#71-79)
	- BasicToken.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TMJToken.sol#86-88)
	- ERC20Basic.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TMJToken.sol#52)
	- ERC20Basic.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TMJToken.sol#51)
